subject: Running
New York City Marathon
lead_paragraph: Hendrick Ramaala, the runner-up of the 2005 New York Marathon, won the Newcastle half-marathon in 1 hour 1 minute 3 seconds.
snippet: Hendrick Ramaala, the runner-up of the 2005 New York Marathon, won the Newcastle half-marathon in 1 hour 1 minute 3 seconds.
